### Rideau Canal Skateway - Janitorial Services, Sanitary Waste Management and Litter Control

** Tender Reference:** AB001

** Publication Date:** August 11, 2023

** Tender Closing Date:** September 5, 2023, at 3:00 PM EDT

** Duration of Contract:** Four (4) years, commencing on October 1, 2023, and ending on March 31, 2027

** Description:**

The National Capital Commission (NCC) invites qualified bidders to submit their proposals for janitorial services, sanitary waste management, and litter control for the operation and maintenance of the Rideau Canal Skateway. The Rideau Canal Skateway is a world-renowned winter skating rink, offering a variety of amenities, including concessions, skate and shed rentals, shelters, washrooms, and rest areas.

** Requirements:**

* Provide janitorial services, including cleaning and sanitizing of the skating rink and surrounding areas
* Manage sanitary waste disposal and ensure compliance with all applicable regulations
* Implement a litter control program to maintain a clean and safe environment for users
* Ensure compliance with all hours of service, employment standards, and safety regulations

** Key Performance Indicators (KPIs):**

* Quality of services
* Safety record
* Timeliness and responsiveness to service requests
* Compliance with all regulations and standards

** Evaluation Criteria:**

* Lowest price (🔍)
* Complying with all contract requirements
* Ensuring high-quality services

** Additional Information:**

* Proposal submissions must be received by the tender closing date and time.
* Addenda and amendments will be posted on canadabuys.canada.ca.
* Bidders are responsible for ensuring they have received all relevant information to submit a compliant proposal.
* Only written inquiries will be considered, and responses will be provided through addenda.
* Proposal submissions will be evaluated based on the evaluation criteria and other factors as determined by the NCC.
